item.title: yodaimperium.de
item.description: Hosting The entire website is hosted on a RaspberryPi 3. Software nginx Security In order ensure the website can be accessed securely all traffic is SSL encrypted using certbot for SSL-certificate generation. Because the SSH port also has to be opened to the internet in order for my GitHub Actions script to work properly, I had to secure the Pi against unauthorized acces via SSH too. Therefore, I made sure the GitHub Actions script only accesses the server as a deploy user.
